item.description:
Tuesday, September 28, 2010, 7:30-9:30pm, $20

Level One of a series of experiential workshops for men who desire greater authenticity, ease and erotic fire in relation with women.

♦ Would you like to have a relationship that is full of passion, integrity and ease?
♦ Are you tired of being the nice guy who doesnâ€™t get any?
♦ Do you want to know what women want?

This is a unique opportunity to get both the male and female perspectives on gender dynamics and sexual empowerment from two experts in the field.

You will learn concrete tools to tap into your internal strength, and techniques to channel that power in healthy and appropriate ways. Gain access to a state of being that respectfully and un-apologetically commands respect from others.

In this workshop you will:

♦ Learn powerful energy practices to access greater confidence and self esteem.
♦ Discover the key to attracting the connections you desire.
♦ Harness your authentic sexual magnetism.

Brynn Bishop is a Tantra Educator and Intimacy Coach with over twenty years experience in the fields of body-mind integration and conscious relating. Through a unique synthesis of diverse modalities, Brynn assists individuals and couples in developing personal empowerment, relational skills and expanded pleasure. She is passionate about helping others increase their capacity for connection and pleasure, and access their full aliveness and passion!

As a NLP Master Practitioner Derek Ebrecht helps individuals and couples to attract the life, passion and vitality they desire. His passion for building relationships and maintaining them through time has been a focus of his for 10 years. Let him guide you to finding relationships that last.
item.name: Authentic Masculine Magnetism Intro
